meanings.definition: A Chinese system of physical exercises and breathing control related to tai chi.
meanings.sent1: Practicing qigong helps improve flexibility and relaxation.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy the calming effects of qigong in the park.
meanings.sent3: The panda tried qigong to learn how to relax like the bamboo.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were as graceful as a swan gliding through water during qigong practice.
meanings.sent5: The gentle flow of qigong movements soothes the mind and body.
